description: Unique identifier of the work order this status record relates to.
Sequence number of this status history record within the work order, used for chronological ordering.
Standardized code representing the work orderâ€™s lifecycle status at this step.
Type of audit event recorded for this entry.
Likely indicates whether an email notification was triggered for this status event; confirm with SME.
Recipient email address(es) used for the notification related to this event; confirm with SME.
Indicator that the work order is on hold as of this status entry.
User or party who requested the hold for the work order.
Free-text notes describing the change or context for this status entry.
Person or team responsible for the work order at this step.
User ID that created this status history entry.
Date and time this status history entry was created.
User ID that last modified this status history entry.
Date and time this status history entry was last modified.
Full name of the user associated with this entry; confirm with SME.
Name of the field that changed as part of this event; confirm with SME.
Previous value of the changed field before this event.
New value of the changed field after this event.
Additional free-text comments associated with this status event.
